title: The 9 most important interpretations of seeing dough in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing dough in a dream? There is no sign of returning from the trip. The interpretation of seeing spoiled dough in a dream? Evidence that the viewer is exposed to a major financial loss. What is the interpretation of seeing a married woman with dough and flour? A sign that you are hearing a lot of good news. What does it mean to see yourself eating dough? Caramel? Evidence of the arrival of goodness and abundant food. What is the interpretation of seeing yourself eating good dough? Many blessings and blessings that one will receive. Interpretation of seeing dough and yeast in a dream? Evidence of the good deeds, blessings and pleasures to come. You see yourself cutting the dough and putting it in the oven? A sign of her approaching marriage. Interpretation of the vision Dough in dreams According to Ibn Sirin, seeing dough in a dream indicates the return of the missing person from the trip in the near future, God willing. When the dreamer sees this kneading dough, it is a sign of the abundance of livelihood and the luxury of life and luxury that he enjoys. Imam Nabulsi believes that seeing dough in a dream is evidence of the ease of the dreamer’s affairs. And his circumstances will improve, God willing. While seeing spoiled dough in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer will suffer a great financial loss in the coming days. Ibn Shaheen explained that dreaming of barley flour dough is a sign of paying off the dreamer’s debts. The symbol of dough in Al-Osaimi’s dream. Imam Al-Osaimi sees dough in a dream A sign of reaping a lot of financial gains and profits. Seeing a married woman making dough and flour in a dream is a sign that you will hear a lot of good news soon. Whoever sees in a dream that he is baking dough in a dream shows the good qualities that the dreamer has in reality. But if a divorced woman sees yeast in Her dream means getting rid of the sorrows and worries that she suffers from. Seeing dough in a pregnant woman’s dream symbolizes an easy, natural and safe birth for her and her newborn, God willing. Interpretation of seeing eating dough in a dream Seeing an unmarried young man eating dough in his dream indicates the date of his marriage to a fair virgin. When a married man sees that he is eating dough and it tastes delicious in a dream, this is a sign of the end of marital problems and quarrels. As you can see, eating caramel dough in a dream is evidence of the arrival of goodness, abundant living, and abundant money. While dreaming that you are eating good, hard dough symbolizes the many blessings and blessings that he will receive. On it to the sleeper. If the dreamer sees that he is eating uncooked dough in a dream, this is evidence that he is in a hurry to make decisions and feels regret. Interpretation of seeing dough in a dream is good news for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman infected with yeast in a dream means that she will give birth easily and that her baby will be born The new one enjoys good health and prosperity. When a woman sees that the dough has fermented in a dream, this indicates that her condition is approaching, and that God knows the unseen. While seeing kneading dough in a dream symbolizes that she is making a lot of effort to achieve her goals and dreams. But if she sees the dough ripening and becoming sweet In his dream, this is evidence of goodness, grace, livelihood, and money. If she is sick and sees yeast in her dream, then this is

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of the dream is that blood comes out of the mouth

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream that blood comes out of the mouth? Blood appears in a dream in different shapes and forms. He may see it coming out of his hand or foot, he may see it coming out of his mouth, and the dreamer may see that his gums are bleeding a lot of blood. The topic of the article now is the interpretation of a dream of blood coming out of the mouth. Through an Egyptian website, you will know the most clear connotations of this vision. Interpretation of a dream of blood coming out of the mouth: You must first answer this question: Is this blood spoiled and smells bad, or was it natural blood and its smell is acceptable? Here are the clearest indicators of this vision: Do you know the most important interpretations? Positive to the vision? Or not: If the dreamer vomits a lot of blood in his dream, then this dream indicates two symbols: First code: Here the blood symbolizes the sins and misdeeds that the dreamer committed in his life. Second code: Vomiting this amount of blood in the dream is an indication of The dreamer will return from the path of sin in which he spent many years of his life. He will regret what he did before, and he must persevere in this repentance and completely distance himself from the sins he committed until God accepts his repentance. Second: Some commentators said that seeing blood bleeding from the dreamer’s mouth indicates Until the calamity that he suffered for many years will be removed by God. Physical discomfort: If the dreamer sees blood bleeding from his mouth, he should not be afraid of what he saw in his dream, because it expresses. The end of the financial crisis that he experienced in the past days, and God will deliver to him a lot of money that will make him happy in future times. It erases his past suffering. Bad social conditions: The dreamer may be worried in his life because of his many quarrels with his family, friends, and even colleagues, and all of these quarrels filled his life with negative energy and anxiety. Therefore, the blood that comes out of his mouth is a sign of the return of positive energy to his life again through... The beneficial social relationships that he will create with people and perhaps the scene. A gesture of peace with someone soon. Envy and its negative effects: Jurists have assigned everyone who dreams of this vision to be strengthened by Sharia ruqyah. This indicates that the fortuneteller is surrounded by evil eyes in his life and his friends at school or university may envy him because he always stands out. And superior. Perhaps he is envied by his colleagues because he is creative and innovative in his work, and there are many aspects to envy. They may envy him for his money or beauty, and perhaps even his marriage, and thus fortify him with prayer. Memories are the best divine weapon that eliminates his envy and problems. Magical and demonic possession: The dreamer may soon enjoy the relief and comfort that God will provide for him by removing him from the spell that he has been suffering from for many years. Therefore, whoever eats from the magic of eating or the magic of separation or turmoil, all this evil will go away forever. Forever, and the fortuneteller's life returns to normal, whether he is a man or a woman. Emotional disorders: Jurists said that blood coming from the mouth in a dream is an indication that the dreamer wanted to gain something in his waking life and is facing great difficulty in achieving it, but after this vision all difficulties will disappear. Completely in front of him. Third: If the blood was without any repellent odor and came out of the dreamer’s mouth in the dream, this indicates

title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about a snake

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a snake by Ibn Sirin It has many connotations and meanings that make dreamers want to know about it, and in the following article we will discuss many of the interpretations given to us by our distinguished scholars, so let’s read more. Interpretation of a dream about a snake by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets a dreamer who sees a snake in a dream and is not afraid of it, as evidence of His strong personality allows him to face all the issues facing him in a good way. If one sees a snake in his dream, this is a sign that he will receive a very important promotion in his workplace in appreciation of the efforts he is making to develop it. If the dreamer sees a very small snake during his sleep, this expresses The presence of a person carrying negative feelings inside him, but he is unable to harm him and there is no need to worry. If the dreamer sees a white snake in a dream, this is evidence that he will get a lot of money from his work, which will be very prosperous. Interpretation of a dream about a snake for a single woman by Ibn Siriniri Ibn Sirin The interpretation of a dream about a snake for an unmarried woman is evidence that she is surrounded by many people who hate her and hate her intensely, and she must be careful to be safe from their evil. If the dreamer sees a snake in her house in her dream, this expresses the presence of a close friend who contradicts her to the point of Large, as he shows her friendliness and the exact opposite. If the dreamer sees a long and huge snake in his dream, this is a sign of bad events that will happen in her life that will put her in a very bad situation. A girl who sees a colorful snake in her dream shows her great naivety and good faith in all matters, which makes her Vulnerable to deception many times. Interpretation of a dream about a snake for a married woman by Ibn Sirin. The dream of a married woman in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a snake, shows the many differences that prevailed in her relationship with her husband at that time, making the situation between them very turbulent. If the dreamer sees some small snakes in her dream This is a sign that although she has faced many problems in her life, she is able to deal with them well. If the dreamer sees a blue snake in his dream, this represents the abundant money that they will receive, which will contribute greatly to improving their living conditions. A woman who sees a snake in her dream indicates the presence of an immoral woman hovering around her husband to trap him in her net and cause division between them. Interpretation of a dream about a snake for a pregnant woman according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing a pregnant snake in a dream, as Ibn Sirin indicated, symbolizes that the gender of her child is a boy, and this matter will be Very satisfactory for her husband. If the dreamer sees the snake in her bed while she is sleeping, this is a sign that she will not have any problems during the birth of the newborn and the process will go well and she will enjoy carrying her child safely from all evil. If the dreamer sees a large snake in his dream, this means that she will greatly improve the upbringing of her child and will enjoy seeing him in the highest positions in the future. A woman who sees a snake in her dream indicates that her husband was ready for her comfort at this time so that it would not befall her.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about eating grilled fish according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: What you do not know about the interpretation of a dream about eating grilled fish Interpretation of a dream about eating grilled fish in a dream It has a good omen, especially if the fish meat is white and delicious, but there are different cases for seeing grilled fish that will be presented in the following lines, taking into account the explanation of the interpretations of senior scholars such as Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi and others. Interpretation of a dream about eating grilled fish Eating grilled fish in a dream indicates abundant and impurity-free nutrition that the dreamer will obtain. This general interpretation includes five interpretations that branch out according to the dreamer's job, the nature of his life and his gender as follows: Or not: Whoever eats grilled fish with his colleagues or his boss at work will continue his work for many years because it will be a great door to living his life, knowing that he lives in a calm atmosphere in his work and his social relationships within it. It is stable and fruitful. Second: Whoever dreams of eating this delicious fish with her doctor who actually heals her, she will enjoy health and wellness due to his care for her and his sincerity in taking care of her condition to bring her to safety. Third: When a female student eats grilled fish with her university professor or teacher, this is a great blessing for success and educational excellence. If the dreamer has been separated for a while in reality and sees in her dream that she is eating grilled fish, her social status will change quickly and she will be the wife of a wealthy man and may have children from him, in addition to her stability in her relationship with him. It is preferable that the size of the fish seen in the dream is large, because if the fish is small and does not have much meat and the dreamer does not feel full after eating it, this indicates depression and sadness in his life. If the dreamer eats a piece of grilled fish in his dream and finds its taste salty, then he plans to travel abroad to gain the highest scientific ranks, and if he eats the whole fish, then he is actually traveling and what he does. The desired travel will be fulfilled, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about eating grilled fish by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said that grilled fish is a symbol whose interpretation changes according to the dreamer's religious status and the nature of his relationship with God Almighty. If the dreamer is upright in his actions and fears God, then eating grilled fish means that the Lord of the Worlds will accept his supplication and within a few times all his desires will be fulfilled. And his pains and whoever wants money and everyone has closed doors in front of him, God will provide for him from where he does not expect, and whoever asks God to marry a girl he wants, his wife will soon be. As for the dreamer, if he is destined for the whispers of Satan and does it in his life, then if he sees that he is eating grilled fish, he suffers from a great temptation from God, as if it is a great torment from him. Until he learns and does not do the bad thing again. If the fortuneteller eats a grilled fish whose meat is tough and difficult to chew, he will live in a predicament and achieve his desires only by toil and toil. But if its meat is fresh and delicious, this is an effortless supply and an abundant and limitless commodity. Seeing the dreamer eating this fish with his family means a livelihood that fills his entire life according to the type of livelihood that each member of the family requests. Whoever wants to get married will get married, and whoever wants a job will find it. Whoever dreams of the opportunity to travel will get it, and whoever wants to work

title: Interpretation of eight o'clock in a dream

preview.html: Through this article, we will learn together about the meanings and interpretations related to seeing the clock and the number eight in a dream, so stay with us. Interpretation of seeing the eighth clock in a dream for a single girl Seeing the eighth clock in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that her financial and moral situation will change for the better, God willing. The eighth clock in the dream of an unmarried woman indicates that her life is calm and free of problems and worries, and God knows best. As it was said in the interpretation of the eighth clock in a dream for a single woman, she expects an important event in the next few days, such as traveling or accepting a job. The eighth clock in the dream of an unmarried woman is a sign of her approaching engagement, and if she is engaged, this is news of an imminent marriage. The number 8 in the dream of a single woman refers to her loyal friend, who wishes her good and happiness, as well as to her sister. See also: Interpretation of the third clock in a dream Interpretation of seeing the eighth in a dream for a married woman Interpretation of the eighth clock in a dream for a married woman is one of the visions that bring kindness and optimism, God willing. Whoever looks at the clock in a dream and sees that it is the eighth, this is a sign that her marital life is stable and enjoys peace and understanding with her family members. Seeing the eighth clock in a dream A married woman means success in worldly matters and the fulfillment of her desires soon. The number 8 in a married woman's dream foretells the presence of a blessing in her home and livelihood, and an appearance that benefits her children, and God knows best. The number eight in a dream represents the dreamer's son, who is part of her heart, and he must take care of her and be close to her, because he always needs her. Interpretation of seeing the eight o'clock in a dream about a man and its meaning Seeing the eight o'clock in a man's dream indicates that the dreamer is close to his dreams and will achieve them soon, God willing. The number 8 in a man's dream often refers to his personality characterized by ambition, independence and self-confidence. Whoever waits for time in his sleep until eight is good news of the disappearance of his worries, the end of his problems and the beginning of a new problem. Seeing the number 8 in English in a dream symbolizes infinity, and it is a metaphor for longevity, good health and permanent strength. Interpretation scholars say that the number 8 in a married man's dream symbolizes his wife who has minds, wisdom and the ability to manage household affairs. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a watch in a dream in detail The meaning of seeing the eight o'clock in a pregnant woman's dream and its interpretation Interpretation of the eight o'clock in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence of That the dreamer is in a stable health condition, and she and her fetus are in good health, God willing. If she is suffering from an unstable pregnancy or postpartum complications, this dream heralds her release and the completion of the birth in a good way, thanks to God. Seeing the number 8 in a woman’s dream indicates many solutions that will be presented to the dreamer in order to resolve disputes and problems between her and her family. It was also said that the eighth hour in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of the birth of twins, and that the birth process is near, and God knows best. It is said that the number eight in a pregnant woman’s dream

title: Interpretation of praise in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of praise in a dream for a single woman For a married woman For a pregnant woman For a divorced woman, whether with a rosary or a ring of praise Interpretation of glorification in a dream Ibn Sirin Muhammad bin Shirin, may God have mercy on him, said in his book Interpretation of Great Dreams that seeing glorification in a dream indicates the humility of a person who seeks to reach a position close to God Almighty, which is one of Signs that indicate the dreamer. Goodness is inside and outside, and glory is praise, and thanking God Almighty for His blessings, which is good news, and provides the dreamer with whatever he wants. Whoever dreams that God Almighty is glorified in a dream is a believer. If he says, “Praise be to God,” while he is upset, imprisoned, sick, or afraid, God will save him from a place he does not expect. If he forgets his exaltation, he will be imprisoned or overwhelmed with grief. Whoever prays an obligatory prayer in a dream and then glorifies, glorifies, or glorifies Allah, then this is evidence of fulfilling debts, discharging one’s obligations, fulfilling vows and covenants, and fulfilling conditions. Interpretation of glorification in one dream. Concerning the interpretation of seeing glory in the dream of an unmarried girl or woman, it is an indication of Good relations, and good news about what her heart desires for success, work, marriage, reforming her religion, and travel. Or it and the problems that will go away, God willing. Interpretation of praise in a married woman’s dream. As for a married woman who sees praise in her dream, it is an indication of the benefit or money that she will gain, or it is imminent news of her pregnancy, or an indication of good news. Interpretation of praise in a pregnant woman’s dream. As for the interpretation of seeing Glorification in a pregnant woman’s dream is an indication of God Almighty’s blessings and blessings upon her, and the good news of the birth of a male child. Interpretation of the blessing of the rosary in a dream: Seeing a rosary or rosary in a dream is considered one of the topics worthy of praise and is closely related to glorification, and therefore the comprehensive interpretation of seeing the rosary in a dream will be mentioned. In the following article, God willing, the glorification of the rosary in a dream is an indication of the dreamer’s wealth, money, pride, and status in society, and an indication that he is doing good. Interpretation of the blessing of the hand in a dream With regard to the glory on the hand in the dream, the hand, as we mentioned in a detailed explanation of it, is a sign of effort and work, and glory In the hand it can herald the marriage of a single person or a meeting. And the fraternal gathering and meeting of loved ones in God, or is it the destruction of worries, disagreements, and quarrels. Interpretation of asking for forgiveness with praise in a dream. As for seeing the monarch glorifying and asking for forgiveness, it indicates the death of distress and distress, or the disappearance of sadness and distress, or an indication of recovery from an illness or the recovery of a sick person, or mercy that the dead person will receive. Or good news about the fulfillment of desires, or it is an answered prayer. Interpretation of the blessing of a rosary in a dreamIn the interpretation of a dream that sees a rosary or a rosary in a dream, or one who sees that he is swimming with a rosary, a rosary, or a worm in a dream, if the dreamer sees that he is counted in beads, seashells, or a rosary. In a dream, this indicates joys and pleasures, and contentment in the soul, and the rosary in the dream indicates a righteous woman who helps her husband and leads a good life with legitimate money. And if the dreamer sees that someone gives him a gift or presents him with a rosary or prayer beads while he is single, this indicates the speed of his marriage. , Faiza

title: Interpretation of dreams defending Islam in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about defending Islam in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Dreaming about the Islamic religion in general is considered one of the most disturbing things for the dreamer, as these dreams help send a message that must be known and its content must be known. It also turns out to be a sign that seeing the defense of Islam is one of the dreams that is repeated. Often, their interpretations differ depending on the symbols present in this dream, and from this point we will go to this article to clarify the interpretation of dreams, defending Islam in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of defending Islam for a divorced woman in a dream. The vision of defending Islam differs from one person to another, and this It depends on the various events and processes that occur in this dream, as the ultimate outcome for people interested in dreams is an indescribable interest in order to learn about themselves. The near reality and all the interpretations that will make them realize what will happen in the near future, so we will explain the interpretation of dreams. We move on to defending Islam in a divorced woman’s dream, as follows: Seeing a divorced woman defending Islam in a dream is a dream that shows the strength of faith. It is also evidence of morality. The good and noble that a divorced woman enjoys. In addition, these dreams may indicate getting rid of worries and sorrow. In addition, these signs indicate the treatment of diseases. Also, seeing the pronouncement of the two Shahadas in a divorced woman’s dream indicates repentance and a return to God Almighty. Watch Also: Interpretation of a dream about swimming in a swimming pool in a dream from the most famous interpretation scholars. Interpretation of dreams about defending Islam for singles by Ibn Sirin. Dreams are the window through which we can deduce the near future, where many events and processes will occur, as it turns out that defending Islam is one of the most prominent contents of dreams that have interpretations. Many, including what we will present in the following lines in which we will explain the interpretation and interpretation of dreams and defending Islam in an unmarried woman’s dream, as Ibn Sirin explained as follows: Seeing an unmarried girl becoming Muslim indicates her good condition. In general, seeing defending Islam in a dream is One of the happy people who are led in life. Also, the dream of defending Islam is one of the dreams that indicates the success of an unmarried girl in her next life. It can also indicate getting rid of the obstacles and dilemmas that she suffers from in her life. Also, the dream of defending Islam indicates To protection from all traps, machinations and crises. He is also one of the happy mortals who indicate the recovery of the sick. While the unmarried girl saw that she was inviting someone to enter Islam, it is evidence of her freedom from temptations and evidence of her integrity. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing Fatima Al-Zahra in a dream One of the most famous interpreters is the interpretation of a dream about defending the Prophet against Ibn Sirin’s wife. If a married woman sees that she is calling to Islam, then she is one of the righteous mortals who show her piety and fear. It is also possible that the vision of defending the Prophet in a married woman’s dream is according to Ibn Shiri.

title: Interpretation of a dream about giving away a camel

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about the gift of a camel in a dream In case you want to know the interpretation of a dream about the gift of a camel in a dream, it is one of the dreams that makes the dreamer feel very anxious, but he wants to know the interpretation of that. We will learn about its interpretation in the following lines, which are the interpretations of some working scholars and not the ones listed. On the site, it does not interfere with interpretations, but rather conveys the interpretations of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about giving a camel in a dream. Receiving a camel as a gift in a dream can indicate marriage to a very intelligent woman, thanks to God. Dreaming about receiving a camel as a gift in a dream may indicate an abundance of money that may The dreamer will acquire it in his life during this time, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing a camel being given a gift in a dream indicates positive changes that will occur to the dreamer in his life during this period, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing a camel being given a gift in a dream indicates relief from fatigue. The psychological and stress that the dreamer has suffered from for a long time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about giving a child in a dream: Receiving a child as a gift in a dream may indicate the abundant money that the dreamer may receive in his life during this time. It is possible that seeing a child giving a gift in a dream indicates Relief from the difficulties that the dreamer faced in his life in those days. Dreaming of giving birth to a child in a dream may indicate positive changes that may occur to the dreamer in his life during this period. If one sees a girl’s gift in a dream, this may indicate happiness that comes to the dreamer in Those days of his life, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about offering grape leaves in a dream: Giving grape leaves in a dream may indicate the blessing and goodness that a subordinate may receive in his life during this time. In the event that in my personal opinion he took grape leaves in a dream, this may indicate He enjoys good health and is free from the health crises that he has been suffering from for a long time. A dream about picking grape leaves in a dream may indicate the expansive life that the dreamer may achieve during this period, and God knows best. It is possible that the vision of receiving grape leaves as a gift in a dream indicates... Getting rid of the worries and sorrows that the dreamer suffered from in his life, and he obtained the period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about gifting a plate of sweets in a dream Giving a plate of sweets in a dream may indicate the love that the dreamer has with those around him in those days, and God knows best. The dream Receiving a plate of candy in a dream as a gift may indicate mutual love between him and that person, and God knows best. In the case of seeing a gift of a plate of candy in a dream, this may indicate the abundance of goodness that the dreamer enjoys in his life during those days. The dream of a person Giving a plate of sweets to those around him in a dream may indicate happiness and goodness that the dreamer is doing to those around him at this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about Eid cake as a gift in a dream Giving Eid cakes in a dream may indicate goodness coming to the dreamer during this time, thanks to God. It may Dreaming of holiday cakes as a gift in a dream indicates a person’s nature and morals

title: The 20 most important evidence of seeing gold extracted from dirt in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The clearest signs that you see gold mining from dirt in a dream. Interpretation of seeing gold coming out of dirt in a dream. It indicates benefit and abundant livelihood in some cases, and it may indicate loss in some other cases. Therefore, the dream indicates complex and dual connotations, and you will learn about them fully in the paragraphs. Next: You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Google, an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Mining gold from dirt in a dream. An article by some jurists. The barren dreamer who sees that he is taking out gold earrings from the dirt in a dream and his wife becomes pregnant with boys. And if the fortuneteller makes money from gold, it is food that God gives him For him, but he must be very careful, because this food is plentiful, and it may make him care about worldly pleasures and fall short in worship, and therefore the monarch must be a wise man and not neglect the requirements of religion. If the dreamer owns agricultural lands and cares for them, and dreams that he is extracting gold From his land in a dream, this is interpreted as a livelihood and a lot of money that he gets from this land. When a student sees that he finds a lot of gold and takes it out of the dirt, his academic steps will be strong and steady and he will achieve brilliant educational success from it. Whoever works in trade and sees this dream, what is it? He has a livelihood in his life, and God grants him great wealth that he and his grandchildren will enjoy. Extracting gold from the dirt in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. This dream could be a sign of many offspring, and if one sees a large number of gold necklaces and bracelets in the dream, then there are many sons and daughters who will be blessed The dreamer has them in his married life. The large gold that the dreamer pulls out of the dirt in a dream is evidence of a lot of money that has been saved for a long time so that he feels secure in his life. The sultan or ruler who sees this symbol in his dream has great power in terms of abundance of money and a large army. He will win his next battles, God willing, and as a result of this victory, his country will return with more spoils and money to the defeated countries. But when the dreamer extracts gold from the dirt in his dream and finds its color faded, it is a fatal disease that afflicts him and causes him to lose his money and his professional authority. Mining gold from dirt in the dream of an unmarried woman. Gold in A human dream is a benign symbol and indicates a happy and prosperous marriage or happy circumstances in the future, but there are many details in the vision that need clarification: Exporting a shiny gold ring studded with diamonds: If the dreamer dreams that he finds a beautiful ring, studded with precious stones, this means that the husband The person with authority and high relationship will be from a famous family of famous origin. Searching for gold and silver coins: This symbol is interpreted as a halal function and does not conflict with Sharia law and its controls, and through it you will obtain a lot of money. Finding a lot of gold in the ground and giving it to someone :When the dreamer takes a lot of gold in her dream from the ground, and brings it back to her home and gives it to her sister or mother from it, she will be a source of livelihood in her home, helping her family in her life and giving them material care.

The large gold that the dreamer pulls out of the dirt in a dream is evidence of a lot of money that has been saved for a long time until he feels secure in his life. The sultan or ruler who sees this symbol in his dream has great power in terms of abundance of money and a large army and will win his upcoming battles, God willing, and as a result of this victory, his country will return with more spoils and money to the defeated countries. But when the dreamer extracts gold from the dirt in his dream and finds its color faded, it is a fatal disease that afflicts him and causes him to lose his money and professional authority. Mining gold from dirt in an unmarried woman’s dream Gold in a person’s dream is a good symbol and indicates a happy and prosperous marriage or happy circumstances in the future, but There are many details in the vision that need clarification: Exporting a shiny gold ring studded with diamonds: If the dreamer dreams that he found a beautiful ring, studded with precious stones, this means that the husband with authority and high relationship will be from a famous family of famous origin. Searching for gold and silver coins: This symbol is interpreted as a permissible function and does not conflict with Sharia and its controls, and you will get a lot of money through it. Finding a lot of gold in the ground and giving it to someone: When the dreamer takes a lot of gold in her dream from the ground, returns it to her home and gives it to her sister or mother from it, it will be a source of livelihood in her home, helps her family in her life and gives them material care
